name: Hikari's Station
description:
Hikari's Station

Make new friends on the train ride home across Tokyo. Take selfies to rack up points while trying (not) to annoy your cute fellow passengers. Reflect on the charming but fleeting faces around us. Who will you meet?

A game in collaboration with musician Terrane. The game's soundtrack is also available!

Originally created for the A Game By Its Cover jam (September 2017), inspired by this Famicase cartridge art by minomawari.

Keyboard Controls

Arrow Keys — move

Z — greet

C — phone camera

Escape — pause game

f4 — toggle fullscreen

Gamepad Controls

Left Stick — move

A — greet

B — phone camera

Start — pause game

Select — toggle fullscreen
